Package org.dellroad.dataskin.ops

Interface Operation<C,R>

Type Parameters:
C - configuration type for this operation
R - result type for this operation
All Known Subinterfaces:
Action<C,R>, InstanceAction<T,C,R>, InstanceOperation<T,C,R>, InstanceQuery<T,C,R>, Query<C,R>, StaticAction<C,R>, StaticOperation<C,R>, StaticQuery<C,R>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAction, AbstractInstanceAction, AbstractInstanceQuery, AbstractOperation, AbstractQuery, AbstractStaticAction, AbstractStaticQuery
public interface Operation<C,R>
An operation that can be performed in a DataSkin model.

Instances and their corresponding configuration objects should properly implement Object.equals(java.lang.Object).

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static interface 
    Operation.Handle<C,R>
    An Operation bound to a target object (if necessary) so that it may be executed.
    static class 
    Operation.Progress
    Captures the state of progress of an Operation.

  • Method Details

    • getConfigType

      com.google.common.reflect.TypeToken<C> getConfigType()
      Get the type of the objects that are used to configure this operation, if any.

      If no configuration is required, this should return type Void.

      Returns:
      operation configuration object type, never null

    • getResultType

      com.google.common.reflect.TypeToken<R> getResultType()
      Get the type of the result of this operation.
      Returns:
      operation result type, never null

    • requiresConfiguration

      default boolean requiresConfiguration()
      Determine if this operation requires configuration.

      If an operation does not require configuration, the configuration object will not be edited prior to starting the operation.

      The implementation in Operation compares the configuration Java type to Void.

    • getLabel

      String getLabel()
      Get a simple textual description of this operation.

      Should be something short and suitable as a box title or menu item, e.g., "All Users", "Delete User", "Search by Name", etc.

      Returns:
      operation label

    • getHandle

      Operation.Handle<C,R> getHandle(Object target)
      Get a handle for executing this operation on the specified instance (if any).

      For an InstanceOperation, the target must be non-null, and the returned Operation.Handle will be bound to it.

      For a StaticOperation, the target must be null.

      Parameters:
      target - target object, or null if this is a StaticOperation
      Returns:
      handle for executing this operation on target
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if this is an InstanceOperation and target has the wrong type
      IllegalArgumentException - if this is an InstanceOperation and target is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if this is an StaticOperation and target is not null
